price: Ìwọ Ànábì, bẹ̀rù Allāhu. Má sì tẹ̀lé àwọn aláìgbàgbọ́ àti àwọn ṣọ̀bẹ-ṣẹ̀lu mùsùlùmí. Dájúdájú Allāhu ń jẹ́ Onímọ̀, Ọlọ́gbọ́n.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ ٱتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nabiyu ittaqi al-laha walā tuṭiʿi al-kāfirīna wal-munāfiqīna inna al-laha kāna ʿalīman ḥakīman
